responses.key: where can i find help
responses.text: Stay where you are and use our app's SOS function to seek assistance. Rescue teams will be there as soon as possible.
responses.action: Press the SOS button in the app to send your location to first responders.

responses.key: what exactly happened
responses.text: You have recently been affected by a [natural disaster]. Stay calm and follow the instructions carefully.
responses.action: Navigate to the Instructions page on our app for further guidance.

responses.key: what should i do next
responses.text: Follow the instructions provided in the app and use the SOS function if you require assistance.
responses.action: Go to the Instructions and Do's & Don'ts page on our app for detailed steps.

responses.key: how can i stay informed
responses.text: The app will provide real-time information about the situation.
responses.action: Visit the Information and Live Feed page in the app for ongoing updates.

responses.key: safe places nearby
responses.text: Here are some nearby safe areas:
responses.action: View safe places on the map within the app: {SAFE_PLACES}

responses.key: how do I contact emergency services
responses.text: Use the emergency call button in the app to contact the nearest available emergency services.
responses.action: Click the direct call button to connect with emergency services.

responses.key: what supplies do I need
responses.text: Gather essential supplies such as water, food, a flashlight, a first-aid kit, and extra batteries.
responses.action: Check the checklist of emergency supplies in the app.

responses.key: how do I stay safe during the disaster
responses.text: Follow the safety tips provided in the app for your specific situation and avoid dangerous areas.
responses.action: Access safety guidelines specific to the disaster type in the app.

responses.key: can I help others
responses.text: If you are in a safe condition, you can volunteer to assist others through our app's community support feature.
responses.action: Go to the volunteer signup page in the app to offer assistance.

responses.key: what are the current updates
responses.text: Check the live updates section in the app for the latest information on the disaster situation.
responses.action: Visit the live updates page in the app.

responses.key: how do I charge my phone without power
responses.text: Use a power bank or locate a nearby charging station if available.
responses.action: View a map of charging stations or explore portable charging options.

responses.key: what to do if I am injured
responses.text: If injured, alert emergency medical services through the app and follow basic first-aid guidelines.
responses.action: Check the first-aid instructions and emergency call button in the app.

responses.key: how do I find lost family members
responses.text: Use the family locator feature in the app or contact the nearest help center.
responses.action: Learn how to use the family locator feature in the app.

responses.key: can I report a missing person
responses.text: Yes, use the app's missing persons report feature to alert authorities.
responses.action: Go to the missing persons report page in the app.

responses.key: how do I access clean water
responses.text: Look for nearby clean water sources marked in the app or use purification methods if available.
responses.action: View a map of clean water sources and check the list of purification methods in the app.

responses.key: where can I find food supplies
responses.text: Check the app for locations of food distribution centers near you.
responses.action: View a map of food supply centers within the app.

responses.key: what precautions should I take after the disaster
responses.text: Avoid contaminated areas, follow health advisories, and stay updated through the app.
responses.action: Access a list of post-disaster precautions in the app.

responses.key: how do I report unsafe conditions
responses.text: Use the hazard reporting feature in the app to alert authorities about unsafe conditions.
responses.action: Go to the hazard reporting page in the app.

responses.key: can I donate supplies
responses.text: Yes, use the app's donation feature to contribute supplies to those in need.
responses.action: Go to the donation page in the app.

responses.key: how do I protect myself from infections
responses.text: Follow hygiene guidelines, use protective gear if available, and stay updated on health advisories.
responses.action: Access hygiene tips and health updates in the app.
